website_summaries.verdict: A good option for daily use under makeup and for those who want a high SPF.
pros: Meant to be worn under makeup, but can be used alone
cons: Goes on thick and may make your skin a little shiny

customer_reviews.title: spf and primer in one-perfect for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Mattifying, and blurs out imperfections. Works well by itself and under foundation (powder). I use this instead of traditional primer, and the spf is a major bonus. it seems like the negative reviews are for the tinted primer, which I think is a very different product and confuses the ratings for this product
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Must say that I didn't like it at first due to the really smooth application - strange, I know. But as I used it, I realized it kept my face a bit more shine free than other LRP sunscreens. I have somewhat oily skin (age 51) and live in the hot, humid, south. I like that it gives me a smooth base to put on makeup if I feel like it that day. Looks good on its own as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thick Moisturizer! Good Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. I discovered it from a sample at my doctor's office. It's very thick but feels nice on!! The thickness makes me feel well protected! :) I wear it mostly on days I'll be out in the sun a lot because my regular moisturizer is only a 15, not 50 like this one. I have sensitive eyes, and sometimes this can irritate them a little but it usually stops pretty fast. I've never got burnt in the sun while wearing this so I think it does a good job at protecting the skin from the sun. I definitely recommend this moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.author: MominVirginia

customer_reviews.title: Matte all day - oily girl holy grail!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I really hope I can avoid buying this often but it does seem like a little goes a long way. I loooove it. It makes me as an oily greaseball completely MATTE all day long. It turns my skin into a supple soft rubbery dolphin. The stuff is thick but it spreads a lot and didn’t break me out (and I break out from a ton of different sunscreens - my skin is super finicky!). A+++ wish that it wasn’t so expensive and came in a bigger size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

customer_reviews.title: Thick like a primer, but gives sun protection I need.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm used to using this brand in a liquid form as a moisturizer, but this one is more like a primer texture (thick but soft once applied). I've been using it for several weeks now. I haven't seen anymore sun spots appearing on my skin so I guess the SPF is working like it's suppose to. My foundation glides on top very smooth, so that's a bonus. Still trying to get used to the texture though. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lea P.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Sunscreen Primer - Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This primer sunscreen is a must-have for me. Works so well as a makeup primer for the face and eyes (just not lips if applying lipstick). Really smooths and helps makeup application and staying-power. I use a mattifier underneath and they work well together. I can only find the tinted version on store shelves now. It's greasy, gritty and gross. I recommend this non-tinted version.
customer_reviews.author: Nic in CT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing primer & sunscreen!!
customer_reviews.text: I own many Roche Posay products and have acne prone/oily skin. I love this primer because it doesn't irritate my skin and is a great, silky consistency. I wear it every morning over the Effaclar MAT moisturizer. I especially love the SPF and find that it protects my skin well (but don't forget to reapply SPF regularly!!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product okay
customer_reviews.text: I like this product okay, but will be sticking with my Anthelios 60 Ultra-Light fluid. This didn't really cause outright acne on me, but did clog up pores on my nose and chin pretty badly resulting in blackheads. It is also extremely thick, which didn't matter so much in winter but in warmer weather just didn't feel right.
customer_reviews.author: lady lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says.
customer_reviews.text: It may be a good sunscreen, but it does nothing for minimizing pores or reducing the looks of fine lines. It goes on greasy and stays greasy, not good as a primer - even when I used just a pea sized amount. I've had much better luck with Murad's spf matifier and also with Cetaphil's spf oil control moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended using a sunscreen with at least 10% Zinc oxide. After trying several other brands which always left my skin looking like I had used white wash I found Anthelios. Works great and takes a while but does sink in.
customer_reviews.author: want to be cook

customer_reviews.title: Smoothness you can feel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it’s hard to find a product for my skin that will not irritate it. This did not disappoint, at times it’s hard to spread but if you lather it on your fingers then spread it spreads evenly. I noticed a difference on my skin too, I use it daily after every shower. It is a little bit pricy but it’s worth it at least for me!
customer_reviews.author: Saul Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to spread
customer_reviews.text: The brand is really good BUT it is definitely not easy to use. It is not easy to spread all over your face. So if this is your only sunscreen, I recommend you to buy another one. For a primer it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It may be a good sunscreen but my face doesn't absorb this product that has anti-aging cream inside. I use other products from the same brand as facial sunscreen and they are really good. I don't think I will buy this product again. I will use cream and sunscreen separately for my face.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t leave an oily film. With pandemic I can’t wear make up without ruining my medical face mask at work. This stuff is a great substitution.
customer_reviews.author: T Culver

customer_reviews.title: Not the consistency that is shown
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time I replaced this sunscreen and it is still watery/oily and no the way is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Good but too dry
customer_reviews.text: I finished this sun protection and come to comment. It's good for the type of skins that is oily or less oily. It's not quite moisturizing as many times when I squeeze scream out, it fell to floor because it is too dry. But the good thing is that it is oily like the other brands, and you will not feel anything on your face. Some sun protection creams make you feel you are wearing a mask. But you will not feel like that by using this anti-sun cream .
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Latvia

customer_reviews.title: Helps blur skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! You have to rub it on your fingers to spread more easily. Once on it feels silky. Helps blur imperfections. I don't wear foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to spread all over
customer_reviews.text: This product is really thick—like a really really thick silicone-ish primer. Even after moisturizer and rubbing this between fingers, this was really hard to spread over my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Glow
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight with a great smooth finish. I can wear this without any make-up on top and it makes my skin look great!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Rebernak

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/opened
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my La Roche Posay. The box was ripped and there was NO seal on the tube. So disappointed for the cost of this product. I believe I got someone else’s return. I’m not able to get out to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana M Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are not my thing but, let me tell you, this is amazing. At first you will think this is too tick to be ok but surprisingly it is not heavy, it keeps the oil away!!!!! It is perfect under makeup or alone. Best sun protector ever
customer_reviews.author: marcia duque

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I love the spf 50, love that I can buy this with my HSA. I will say, however, that it might be breaking me out when I use it on an everyday basis. Also, I notice I look a little oilier by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Does exactly what it says. Gives great coverage from the sun and blurs imperfections while keeping your makeup in place! With a matte finish. Love it! Will definitely but again!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Dupreus

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: I also bought this for my sister who is allergic to the sunlight and it makes her skin so soft which is much needed with having XP a condition that makes her allergic to the sun and very dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. I use this product under my foundation/highlighter/contour products and it works well. I love this product because of the high spf, it's worth the price just for that fact. Moisturization and SPF! This primer isn't tinted, as an fyi, and it's lighter on the face than most other primers I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jules2625

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscrean and Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best Sun Screen, moisturizer. Have used it for years and advised it to all my Friends. I am 75 and don't have one single wrinkle!
customer_reviews.author: Fusun D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin feeling smooth and protected
customer_reviews.text: As a sunscreen fiend, this one is the best. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and although it is a primer, I feel OK, leaving the house without foundation and also feel good about the SPF protection. I only wish they would sell it at department stores too, and offer free makeup gifts like the big names do.
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta Geek

customer_reviews.title: Primer, matte - CHECK
customer_reviews.text: sunscreen for South FL - UNCHECK love this product as a primer
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best primer for blurring pores (for me)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good primer. It helped my makeup to last through an 8-hour day. Amazingly enough, it works at blurring my pores better than Hourglass Veil & Tatcha, which is what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: PieNicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply with no residue.
customer_reviews.text: i like that it smooths on with ease. I was surprised that the bottle was so small.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: My makeup slides around with this primer
customer_reviews.text: It’s just okay. It’s a chemical sunscreen that you can smell and my makeup does not sit or wear particularly well over it and I wear a small amount
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stein

customer_reviews.title: Sun Blocker
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of a paste. I put it on before applying makeup if I will be out in the sun. I like it because it stays put and doesn't get oily. I don't breakout. It is odorless. And it blocks the rays. It goes on smoothly once it gets warmed by your body heat. I put a dollop on my palm and rub until it is creamy, then apply. I have bought this several times.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: posay is a great product in any form primer is the best in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: this is a favorite primer I love trying new ones but this is the one i come back to any product made by posay is so effective
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: odd but wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This product does take getting accustomes to. It is thick and pasty before you spread it onto your face. It is, however, wonderful. My skin is hyper sensitive to sunscreens and this one doesn't burn my cheecks. It does give the appearance of smoothing fine lines and generally making skin look more even. It also does reduce shine all day and it doesn't "travel."
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard to squeeze. The cream was dry. It was a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mone

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Brand
customer_reviews.text: La Roche-Posay makes good products for oily skin. This item goes on dry, no greasiness at all.
customer_reviews.author: KMNY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product for his skin. Has been using it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: pris

customer_reviews.title: It was not as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was leaking when I opened the package. And I didn’t like the smell so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ultraviolet

customer_reviews.title: It's La Roche- Posay.....ok
customer_reviews.text: Any La Roche- Posay. product is of high quality. I've done a lot of research and time after time La Roche- Posay.products are listed as #1 by magazine and doctors reviews. I've used their sun screen milk for years, before you could purchase it in the United States. I use sun screen on a daily basis, and I personally use this when I travel so that I don't have to take both a primer and sun screen.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work with my foundation
customer_reviews.text: It feels quite oily and makes my makeup separate from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vanderheyden

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect All-in-One
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. It lasts forever making it a great value. So easy and smooth to apply with great sun protection. I don't wear foundation of any kind and find this give me a smoother appearance. Worth trying for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We ride a motorcycle and I have very fair skin and burn very quickly. This works and feels good on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Motomama

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a complete waste of money. It is way too dry and just pills off the face during application. Same when I try to apply anything over it. Its a primer which means it should be worn UNDER something. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy DeMaeyer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't spread well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this cream. Too bad to use. It is brittle and crumbles as it passes. falls apart when you use it. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA YAMIN

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection without breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and have bad experiences with sun blocks in the past with breakouts or just a heavy plastic feeling. The lighter screens don't seem to provide much protection or sweat off. This one seems like a nice balance. Can't say it really fills in my smile lines but it is an nice sun screen. I recommend this and will get it again.
customer_reviews.author: justwhatineed

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great for those with sun sensitivity but really pricey for small amount is only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Desiree DeGinder

customer_reviews.title: La Roche Posay Anthelios 50 sunscreen and primer
customer_reviews.text: I love it 100% recommended this product is one of the best brand
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen for a Hawaiian holiday recommended by my dermatologist. I got a severe rash in just a few hours with just one application. I'm not allergic to anything but now I have found one product that I will stay completely away from. It was disasterous! I took pictures to show to my dermatologist and to send to the company.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Nikkel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a matte finish sunscreen for my face and it works really well. It starts off really thick but absorbs into skin very well. I generally put it on after face lotion and the Anthelios sunscreen fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not oily and matte finish
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. Great product. Not oily and matte finish. Great for under make up. Great proteccion without the greese
customer_reviews.author: Maria Victoria Barberena

customer_reviews.title: Awful, waxy, pore clogging goo.
customer_reviews.text: This proved to be absolutely awful for my sensitive, combination skin. I used this three days and that was enough. It leaves a greasy, waxy film on your skin and clogs your pores. I usually love LRP's products but this is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with no seal and appeared to be dried ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with no seal and appeared to be dried out. Could not even spread on face. Won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amy Larch

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the finish feels on your face
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for two years. I love the way the finish feels on your face, smooth and silky. I DON'T like how difficult it is to get out of the tube; but the end result is worth the bother.
customer_reviews.author: virginia boyce

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion but sometimes burns
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent matting lotion/sunscreen. My only complaint is that my skin sometimes burns after applying this product. There's something mildly irritating in it that I suspect is one of the sunscreen chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because all my friends love it. Good consistency, nice smell. I liked it but I’m not crazy about it. Was expecting a little more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen, good for man as well. Not white residues or color at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julio G

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this primer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use as a daily sunscreen rather than as a primer, but it does an excellent job of both. It provides a nice diffused glow from my skin, and does some mild evening of dark areas. A little goes a really long way.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I do not have sensitive skin and I had a horrible reaction
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave zero stars, I would. I used this for three days and my face became red, swollen, rough and itchy. I discontinued use. I do not understand why this happened because I do not have sensitive skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Natural looking and best anti- aging!! A most every morning cream. Highly recommeded.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Caballero

customer_reviews.title: My must have
customer_reviews.text: My the most favorite everyday sun screen. Very light on your skin, easy to put on and you don’t feel it at all. I love it and use every day.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gold

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Will be ordering again
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Will be ordering again. I use this after I put oil on my face. I love that it hydrates and primers
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanatic805

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection & pore reduction!
customer_reviews.text: I have hyperpigmentation & large pores that have both gotten worse with age. This product is pricey for a sunscreen but as sun protection & a pore minimizing primer, it’s worth the money. I’ll be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent primer, very smooth and silky. The bonus that it is also sunscreen makes it worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I find this primer to work very well. It goes on easily (although I have had some tubes that seem a little dry) and creates a soft base.
customer_reviews.author: ndcookie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily sunscreen for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This is great daily sunscreen, especially for people with oily skin. It is quite thick, and as the tube ages the product gets an almost powdery consistency (like cookie dough). However, if you spread it on your fingers and then apply it, it's perfect. Nice matte effect.
customer_reviews.author: ba

customer_reviews.title: Matte finish. Really unscented.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Makes skin look really smooth, matte, and velvety. I just got it, so I can't rate it's sunscreen effectiveness yet. No fragrance at all.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: I love the lightweight feel and how my makeup glides over ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this produce for over two years now and never go a day without using it, even in the winter. I love the lightweight feel and how my makeup glides over it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a sample first and fell in love with it. It is thick but smooths on quickly. Great as a foundation to mineral makeup and hey we all need sunblock on our face to prevent those pesky age spots.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skin starts with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face primer and the best sunscreen I have ever used. And I have tried a lot of sunscreens in my life. It goes on like silk and doesn't settle in fine lines. No weird smells. Most importantly it works. This should be in your daily skincare routine. Never leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: BiddyGirl

customer_reviews.title: I saw this product on being recommended on a YouTube channel
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product on being recommended on a YouTube channel. I decided to buy and I can say I like it also, great product. Would recommend. Do note it does say in product description it leaves a light chalk feel.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom, who LOVES using this sunscreen. She uses it both as a foundation (since it is a primer) and loves that it is also a sunscreen. Product is pricey, but was able to get it here on Amazon cheaper than retail
customer_reviews.author: Doxxies

customer_reviews.title: Very nice texture, but it causes me to break out a little!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice texture, but it causes me to break out a little! It is kind of annoying that it makes me breakout a little bit, but it is by far the one that causes me to break out the least! Good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: Matte finished.
customer_reviews.text: The best all in one sunscreen and primer. Applying makeup on tops of it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Stay

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's a good primer and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's a good primer and I like how it protects me from harmful UV rays. I have dark skin and this product doesn't show up with any weird tints.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this La Roche product had Mexoryl, a sun screen compound. Evidently, it does not.
customer_reviews.author: OHairs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply no shaking required
customer_reviews.text: It's average quality. It goes on easily feels a kind of thick.
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this product is a primer and sunscreen in one. It works well as both! It has a light, non-greasy feel, which is perfect for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smooth texture once applied is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This primer is very effective as a sunscreen, but thick and crumbly to squeeze out and apply. Take your time to smooth it out on your face. The smooth texture once applied is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: lori s manning

customer_reviews.title: My sister recommended it and I'm sold
customer_reviews.text: Makes your skin feel so soft - unbelievable. My sister recommended it and I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: MSF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best antiaging sunscreen out there, matt finish, holds well. pricey but worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: karla torres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is extremely light and the finish is matte. It doesn't feel oily even when you are sweating at the gym or on a run. It also goes into your skin extremely easy without much effort. I have always enjoyed sunscreens by La Roche-Posay, because of the quality ingredients and overall sun protection, but this particular one is the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: TathiZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It goes on clear, and is not greasy. Very effective sun block.
customer_reviews.author: charlene temple

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscreen Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of sunscreen was recommended by my dermatologist. It is the best sunscreen I have ever used. It goes right into your skin and leaves it feeling and looking good. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not like any other sunscreen I've ever used. Really feels good going on. Makes my face look great. Powder goes nicely over it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is great sun protection and also a great primer before makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ozmun

customer_reviews.title: like old product
customer_reviews.text: the product is with strange consistency, like old product. I am very sad with this product. Is it possible my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best primers I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: One of the best primers I've ever bought. Love the texture. And I can use it as a sunscreen :D
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Dias Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is just awesome. I love it. I put it on before putting my make-up and it does get my skin tighter. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Minou

customer_reviews.title: Like lard... For your face.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product after a great review I read recently in a fashion magazine, but it actually has the consistency and greasiness of lard. I used it two days and felt the thick, shiny layer sitting on my face the whole day and then broke out of the third day. I have somewhat dry skin and I couldn't take it, so I would strongly caution against use by anyone, well, who possesses pores.
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. I use it daily before my foundation and leaves my skin very soft
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Ask Your Dematologist
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my dermatologist and it is fabulous. Offers full coverage with an amazingly small amount, and extremely easy to apply. Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Smooths skin while protecting
customer_reviews.text: L Roche-Posay Anthelios 50 has a nice scent. Goes on smoothly. Good for skin and protects. A little pricey compared to other sunscreens..
customer_reviews.author: lakelorain

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the sister product for years and this one is great for protecting and helping as a primer with anti-aging under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: jana

customer_reviews.title: Thick or Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the SPF of 50, and I was going on vacation in South America. It was so thick/dehydrated? that it barely came out of the container. Like when you leave the lid off, and the first glob is dry. It did not go on smoothly, and the only reason I brought it home was to return it. Too bad, the window for returns is closed. Many of the other reviews mention "thickness" but I thought it was more dry than thick, which made it very difficult to get to the product. maybe I got an old or defective batch?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Protection and Oil-free Skin
customer_reviews.text: This primer/sunscreen is perfect. I use it as a primer, and it keeps my skin oil-free for the whole day. I was not expecting an SPF 50 sunscreen to be so good as a beauty product as well (they are usually so greasy). Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful protection from the sun
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and this primer keeps me burn free all day in the blazing Florida sun. I have been using it for several years and have not found a better way to protect my face from the sun without a greasy sunblock look and feel. It is not waterproof so it requires reapplying if you're sweating or in the water - otherwise one application will last from sun up to sun down. Yes, it has a thick consistency but it will smooth into your skin and will protect and enhance it. I use it under foundation or on it's own if I'm at the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: may99mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this item It does double duty as a anti aging primer and SPF 50 Sunscreen. Just love this product.
customer_reviews.author: marclorr

customer_reviews.title: love the texture
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture and it's great under my foundation. It's not white so it's also fine if I decide not to wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: kt rose

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied. This is my best choice ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied. This is my best choice ever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mahaly

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was going to like this product when I first got it. The texture is a little thick and I was scared it was going to clog my pores. I was wrong...this is a really good primer. My pores look smaller and it makes my make-up go on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMom

product_meta.title: La Roche-Posay Anthelios 50 Anti-Aging Primer with Sunscreen, 1.35 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
La Roche posay anthelios SPF 50 anti aging primer sunscreen lotion, powerful antioxidants in a primer that provides a blurring effect on skin. High UVA and UVB protection to prevent skin damage. The non greasy and fragrance free formula leaves your skin feeling smooth and silky. Advanced anti aging filtering system. 
INGREDIENTS:

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AVOBENZONE 3% (SUNSCREEN) • HOMOSALATE 10% (SUNSCREEN) • OCTISALATE 5% (SUNSCREEN) • OCTOCRYLENE 5% (SUNSCREEN) • OXYBENZONE 6% (SUNSCREEN).

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS DIMETHICONE • C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE • TALC • DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE • SILICA SILYLATE • GLYCERIN • TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE • DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER • WATER • DIETHYLHEXYL SRYINGYLIDENEMALONATE • CASSIA ALATA LEAF EXTRACT • MALTODEXTRIN.

DIRECTIONS: 1.Can be used alone or under makeup 2.If used with other skincare products, use as a last step in regimen.

FOR SUNSCREEN USE: • Apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure • Reapply at least every 2 hours • Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating • Sun Protection Measures: read back of packaging • Children under 6 months of age: ask a doctor.

BRAND STORY
Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
